scripts.install-server: cd Backend && npm i && npm i cors && npm i shortid && npm i express && npm i dotenv && npm i nodemon && npm i shortid && npm i express-async-errors && npm i mongodb
scripts.install-client: cd Frontend && cd front-url-short && npm install --force
scripts.build-client: cd Frontend && cd front-url-short && npm run build
scripts.start-client: cd Frontend && cd front-url-short && npm run dev
